references.paper_title: Bootstrap your own latent - A new approach to self-supervised learning
references.reason: This paper introduces Bootstrap Your Own Latent (BYOL), a highly influential self-supervised learning method that inspired the contrastive learning approach used in the current research.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This foundational paper on deep residual networks (ResNet) is highly relevant due to its extensive use as the backbone architecture in many self-supervised learning models, including those explored in this work.

references.paper_title: Learning multiple layers of features from tiny images
references.reason: This work introduced the CIFAR-10 and CIFAR-100 datasets, which are extensively used as benchmarks for evaluating self-supervised and federated learning methods and are central to the experimental evaluation in this paper.

references.paper_title: FedMD: Heterogenous federated learning via model distillation
references.reason: This paper proposes FedMD, a foundational federated learning method that leverages model distillation, directly influencing the design and evaluation of the proposed FedMKD framework.
This paper introduces FedEMA, a federated self-supervised learning approach that addresses model divergence issues, which is relevant to the challenges and solutions explored in the current work.
